title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014
yAxis: Share of the burger restaurant market
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and Share of the burger restaurant market in each Burger Restaurant Chains on the y axis.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Burger Restaurant Chains is 8.2.
The highest Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's has 26.1 more Share of the burger restaurant market than the lowest Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.

max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and Share of the burger restaurant market in each Burger Restaurant Chains on the y axis.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is highest at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and lowest at Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
The second highest Share of the burger restaurant market is appeared to be the Burger Restaurant Chains Burger King.

Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's is higher than any other Burger Restaurant Chainss with value 34.3, followed by Burger King, and Wendy's. Down to Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins with the lowest value 8.2.
The Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins tends to be 1.91 percent lower than average.
